Experiments:
{{{field|experiments|holds template}}}

{{{for template|Photocatalytic CO2 conversion|multiple|embed in field=Photocatalytic CO2 conversion experiments[experiments]}}}
{| class="formtable"
! Entry:
| (should be automatically set)
|-

| {{{field|catalyst|input type=Catalyst|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}
|-

| {{{field|cat conc [mM]|input type=regexp|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/}}}
|-

| {{{field|PS|input type=combobox|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}
|-

| {{{field|PS conc [mM]|input type=regexp|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/}}}
|-

| {{{field|e-D|input type=combobox|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}
|-

| {{{field|e-D conc [M]|input type=regexp|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/}}}
|-

| {{{field|H-D|input type=combobox|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}
|-

| {{{field|H-D conc [M]|input type=regexp|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/}}}

| {{{field|solvent A|input type=combobox|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}

|-

| {{{field|pH|input type=regexp|base type=Number|message=Input a value between 0 and 14|regexp=/^([0-9](\.[0-9]+)?!1[0-3](\.[0-9]+)?!14)$/}}}

! Temperature [°C] (can be range):
| {{{field|Temperature [°C]|input type=Number}}}
